title: Fall 2015 Thoughtexchange Process Begins (Hillsboro School District 1J)
text: ( Source : Hillsboro School District 1J) We are pleased to enter the second year of our partnership with Thoughtexchange, an organization that facilitates broad-based community dialogue around important topics. The questions being posed this
